sentence.text: Plant homeo domain finger protein 8 (histone H3-K9 demethylation), as an oncogene, has been highlighted in cancer development and progression.
The results demonstrated that the expression of histone H3-K9 demethylation was significantly increased in tumor tissues from patients with CRC and was correlated with tumor‑node‑metastasis stage.
In vitro and in vivo experiments revealed that histone H3-K9 demethylation accelerated cancer cell growth and migration, confirming the oncogenic role of PHF8 in human CRC.
